sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' // import product from '../product' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { const [product,setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ async function fetchProduct(){ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}/`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() } ) return (
{products.name} Go Back

{products.name}

 Price : ${products.price} Description : {products.description} Price: ${products.price} Status: {products.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock' :'Out Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
